entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 08:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this morning. Wind east 20 km/h except southeast 30 gusting to 50 near the water this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northwest 40 gusting to 60 near the water late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
